page.title: 14Farming
page.content: One change that has taken place over the last few years in the rural areas of thius part of Norfolk has been the increase inthe number of farm produce shops which have grown up mainly beside major roads. One such business has been set up on the A47 King's Lynn to Norwich road in the western most part of the village of East Winch. This started off as roadside shop selling only small amounts of a limited range of locally produced farm produce such as corn on the cob and root vegetables. However the range of goods has been greatly increased to include all those things normally sold in a greengrocers and fruiterers. This means that goods are now acquired from wholesalers as well as from the farm of which the shop is a part. There is also a small section selling gardening products.
